page.title: 02SILK WILLOUGHBY
page.content:
{Silk Willoughby}was mentioned in the {Domesday Book}as{"Wilgebi"}and the church is dedicated to St Denis. There is a{17th Century Manor House,} a{17th Century Rectory}and a {village cross.
The church has 6 bells. Three of them were given by Edgar Mitchell in memory of his parents and sister. There is an{Elizabethan Chalice}which is only used at Easter and Christmas and on other special occasions. The church {school}has closed but the{population has doubled in the last 30 years from 200 to 400. The rectory has been sold.
Newcomers to the village take an active part in its social life and mix with the local born inhabitants.
